name: server
description: This is the api for a fullstack MERN app. This  webapp allows a user to track what calisthenics skills they have been able to achieve or accomplish. The inspiration comes from a map of "100 Places to go Before I DIe" in which you can scratch off a gray layer of a certain place, revealing a cool little design underneath. This is meant to be a virtual way to do that but for calisthenics skills. I hope to eventually expand it from calisthenics to all strength feats.
